CustomField.formula: Billing_To_Account_Name__c + BR() + Billing_To_Addr_Line_1__c + BR() + Billing_To_Addr_Line_2__c + BR() + Billing_To_Addr_Line_3__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To choose a different Bill To Name and Address, use the "Alternate Bill To Name and Address" pane at the bottom-left of this page.
CustomField.label: Billing To
